laboratory_examinations.findings: Two gastric GISTs measuring 110 mm and 23 mm with an epithelioid and mixed phenotype, showing 2 and 6 mitoses per 50 HPF, classified as high-risk due to rupturing during removal.
Three gastric inflammatory fibroid polyps found measuring 19 mm, 14 mm, and 10 mm, composed of fibroblasts and inflammatory cells including numerous eosinophils.
In individual III-3, esophagogastroduodenoscopy revealed three gastric polyps measuring 7 mm, 10 mm, and 15 mm.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: In individual III-4, endoscopic ultrasound indicated the larger lesion increased to 40 mm in 16 months.
